[30;1m281 | [0m[35m    Authenticate in the defined remotes. Use CONAN_LOGIN_USERNAME* and CONAN_PASSWORD* variables if [0m
[30;1m282 | [0m[35m    Ask for username and password interactively in case (re-)authentication is required and there ar[0m
[30;1m283 | [0m[35m    no CONAN_LOGIN* and CONAN_PASSWORD* variables available which could be used.[0m
[30;1m284 | [0m[35m    Usually you'd use this method over conan remote login for scripting which needs to run in CI[0m
[30;1m285 | [0m[35m    and locally.[0m
[30;1m286 | [0m[35m    """[0m

[30;1m165 | [0m[35m        Be aware that This method will get the output from ``git remote -v``.[0m
[30;1m166 | [0m[35m        If you added tokens or credentials to the remote in the URL, they will be exposed.[0m
[30;1m167 | [0m[35m        Credentials shouldn’t be added to git remotes definitions, but using a credentials manager[0m
[30;1m168 | [0m[35m        or similar mechanism. If you still want to use this approach, it is your responsibility[0m
[30;1m169 | [0m[35m        to strip the credentials from the result.[0m
[30;1m170 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m68 | [0m[35m            return commit[0m
[30;1m69 | [0m[35m        except Exception as e:[0m
[30;1m70 | [0m[35m            raise ConanException("Unable to get git commit in '%s': %s" % (self.folder, str(e)))[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m1037[0m[34m of [0m[33m1569[0m[31m ]--[0m

[30;1m137 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m138 | [0m[35mdef ftp_download(conanfile, host, filename, login='', password='', secure=False):[0m
[30;1m139 | [0m[35m    """[0m
[30;1m140 | [0m[35m    Ftp download of a file. Retrieves a file from an FTP server.[0m

   Rule Id: [34mBD000600[0m
       Tag: [34mSecurity.Backdoor.LOLBAS.Windows[0m
